title: Ibuprofen
description: Pain reliever and fever reducer for mild to moderate pain.

title: Cetirizine
description: Antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms.

title: Amoxicillin
description: Antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.

title: Lisinopril
description: Medication for managing high blood pressure.

title: Metformin
description: Commonly prescribed for type 2 diabetes control.

title: Aspirin
description: Blood thinner and pain reliever used to reduce heart attack risk.

title: Omeprazole
description: Proton pump inhibitor used to treat heartburn and acid reflux.

title: Simvastatin
description: Medication to help lower cholesterol and triglyceride levels.

title: Albuterol
description: Inhaler medication for quick relief of asthma symptoms.

title: Hydrochlorothiazide
description: Diuretic used to treat high blood pressure and fluid retention.
